about_the_game:
Welcome to the exciting space world of Karta Centauri! This is not just a game - it's an adventure in which you will become the captain of your own spaceship, traveling through the vast expanses of the universe.

Explore incredible locations, drawing random cards and making strategic decisions on your way to victory. Exciting battles, thrilling adventures and exhilarating discoveries await you in this space card game.

Travel to the stars and fight for survival in the ruthless world of space. In Karta Centauri you will be able to explore unexplored corners of the universe and make decisions that will affect the fate of your ship and its crew.

Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of science fiction and become the hero of your own story. Show your intuition in this card game where every move can determine your fate. Are you ready for a space adventure? Download Karta Centauri and set off to new horizons!
